original_title: Les Français qui n'ont pas inventé internet
overview: Discover the incredible story of these French engineers, who in the 70s, almost invented the Internet. For the first time, the protagonists of the Cyclades project (the first French network, the beginnings of the Internet) come back on this incredible adventure. Now over 90 years old, and despite their advanced age, the "Buena Vista Social Club" of computing remain very active and lead a last fight for a safer and more responsible web.
title: Les Français qui n'ont pas inventé internet
